digital-experience-healthcare/main.js.overview: This script initializes interactive behaviors for a healthcare website, including theme toggling, back-to-top visibility, navbar highlighting, skip-to-content accessibility, toast notifications, and contact form validation. It also logs analytics events and respects user motion preferences.

Scroll to reveal or hide back-to-top button

Form submission validation and feedback (implied)

No explicit route navigation; relies on anchor hrefs
data_flow: Theme preference stored and retrieved from localStorage
Analytics events pushed to window.analyticsLog
Scroll position triggers UI visibility changes
Toast messages dynamically created and dismissed
Form data expected to be validated before submission
